website_summaries.verdict: The PowerShot A3000 IS is a good budget-friendly Canon compact, if nothing else.
pros: good photo quality for its price

customer_reviews.title: TERRIFIC FOR TRAVEL CANDID SHOTS!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the camera for my wife, who was going to Thailand on a University trip. She came back with 500+ photos, taken in all kind of light conditions. All except two or three were in sharp focus, and the best of the lot are good enough to put on the wall. She had to recharge the battery once a week, she says. We uploaded her photos to our computers, no problem. I would recommend this for any casual photographer, including the one that is technically challenged.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Hooks, Acting for Animators

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Photos and Value
customer_reviews.text: Canon has made the best point+shoot cameras for the last 10+ years. This camera takes fantastic photos that are clear as day. This is the fourth PowerShot I have owned and it has the highest photo quality. I especially like the image stabilization and the face selector! These help make sure the pictures come out in focus and everyone's eyes are open! There is a slight delay after you take the photo while it processes. I cannot find anything wrong with it other than that. This camera is an unbelievable value for the low price. If you care about your pictures then you owe it to yourself to put down the smartphone and use a real camera like this.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Horrible picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera because older canon digital Elph fell and broke the lens. This camera's picture quality was so bad that I returned it and purchased a 300HS. 300HS has excellent picture quality and great video and features. I have several cameras and the small one is used for travel/small events. The 300HS is well worth the money compared to this camera. This camera takes pictures that are barely in focus, colors are terrible no matter how close you are to your subject. I am a huge fan of Canon, have a 30D and now the 300HS. This one simply falls far short of delivering quality pictures at any price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple digital camera for a non-techie
customer_reviews.text: I like simple. Hate cell phones, won't have a PDA. Even non-digital cameras--except the disposable kind--are a challenge. This one, however, is perfect for my use--snapshots of scenery and of furniture and craft projects I'm working on. Even the manual was easy to understand (not always the case, as we all know). The only thing I'd have liked to know before buying it is that the memory card is not included. It was no big deal but since I knew NOTHING about digital cameras it never occurred to me it wouldn't be included.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Useless for video
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera specifically for taking video, BEWARE of the self-shutoff in movie mode - 10 minutes only. I purchased this for its large video capacity so I could record my musical performances, for which it is USELESS unless I want to leave the stage every 10 minutes to turn it on again. NOWHERE in the product description is this mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Oatimus

customer_reviews.title: Optimal for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: Good: - Reasonable price with promotions ( camera bag and SD card) - The picture quality is acceptable for non-serious photographer. It provide a bit better than my 2 years old 10 megapixel camera which was 2 times price. - I prefer SD card over micro SD because most of standard computer have a slot so no worry when forget bringing sync cable. Should be better: - The plastic flip cap of battery and SD card slot seem to easily broken. - Auto focus mode is quite slow espacially in poor light condition.
customer_reviews.author: Patama G.

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This camera was purchased thinking that it would "just get by" for my needs. Don't let the price fool you. This camera has been used EVERY day at work, from taking site shots to recording model and serial numbers. It has a place with it's pouch on my side. The quick response and lack of having to fumble around for the correct setting makes this the best digital camera that we own.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I'am

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first camera for a kid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera, the 6th Canon point and shoot, for my 6 year old daughter. She turns seven in a few months and I wanted an inexpensive camera for her to learn on. I tried it when it arraived and it exceeded my expectations. With zoom and image stabilization it can't be beat by any other brand/model in it's price range. Combined with the free memory card and case, I couldn't be happier. It seems fairly sturdy and not so small that it would be easy to drop like our Elphs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johns

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: The camera was broken within a few pictures. I called Canon Customer Service and they asked me to send only the body of the camera back for repair or replacement. I mailed in the camera body and revieved the replacement in about a week, I just sent it regular mail so that was great service. The camera they sent back was not just the camera body but a new camera with battery and everything. The only problem was that it was not a new camera but a repaired return.
customer_reviews.author: s johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: This Canon is priced right and has most of the features I required. It's a little bulkier than my previous Nikon Coolpix camera, but still fits comfortably in my pants pocket (for less than 1/3 the price!) And, although the on screen selection icons and menu progressions aren't very intuitive and take a little getting used to, this camera can be used to create superb photos. I can easily recommend it for someone looking to buy an inexpensive, full-featured camera. I'd buy it again with no concerns...
customer_reviews.author: Fox-on-the-run

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with Canon PS A3000IS
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Canon. The first ELF was a work camera that travled all of the country. The second PowerShot worked great and was given to my wife whose Sony camera died after 20 years. So far the A3000IS has performed flawlessly. You can see the video screen easily in bright sunshine. The 4x telephoto lense and the electronic photo lense is fantastic and I've taken some amazing shots with both. I bought this camera on sale for $79. What a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: but this is the best camera I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I know this camera is now out of date, but this is the best camera I've ever owned. I love how the battery is rechargeable. I've had very good luck with the battery staying charged a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: A terrific compact point and shoot camera at a reasonable price. The pictures were clear and sharp. The flash worked fine. I was taking great pictures right out the box. The instruction manual is clear and useful. Compared with my old Canon elite, the pictures are significantly better in quality and clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Sun City Walt

customer_reviews.title: Great, would be better with a view finder...
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this camera! My first and current camera was a six year old canon powershot I got as a graduation present years ago, and I've got to say, the powershot has come far! While I do miss the viewfinder (it makes my hand steadier) the picture quality is great, and 10mpx for $89 is a total steal! It's super lightweight and I love not having to carry out the double A's anymore with the rechargable lithium battery. It's great picture quality, and my photographer best friend with a DSLR agrees that this camera is a great deal and definitely more than acceptable in the quality of the image for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera with excellent flash performance. I wanted to buy a cheap "use and throw" camera for travel and when Amazon sold this camera for $79 with 4GB card and case, I could not pass up. I was anticipating average performance from this little shooter but I was pleasantly surprised by this camera. Real colors (something rare in a canon), good exposure and excellent flash performance. Idea travel camera!!
customer_reviews.author: Praise Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Haven't figured out all the options but I am looking forward to learning. Takes great pictures as true to the natural colors as possible even with the flash. Does have a slight delay when taking a picture but faster than the rest I have used. I would recommend to anyone! In fact will be purchasing one for Christmas for a family member I liked it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Cm

customer_reviews.title: This Camera is a Treat
customer_reviews.text: Since it is just what I was looking for (and cheap - as in inexpensive) to tide me over til my next DSLR. I'm delighted with this great little picture taker. I'd say image stabilization is mandatory with these little cameras (and it has a special setting for kids/pets!). The movie-taking ability is a big plus. Thirty minutes on a 4G and 2 hours on a 16G card.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great except for 1 thing!! Where's the manual?!?
customer_reviews.text: The camera works great and alot of the stuff is self-explanatory.If you play with it for awhile you can figure out how to use it and discover alot of features. I didn't know I can do videos as well which is a plus because that is what I was looking for!! Guaranteed a good bang for your buck! The only disappointment was not receiving a manual for the camera. I received a manual on a warranty but not for the instructions on how to operate the camera.Overall,it's pretty good and I don't have any hard feelings toward the seller,except that 1 error.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Owen

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Its slightly thicker than other digital cameras, the LCD screen is quite clear. Beast of all the modes dial is a the top so there is no need to fidget with the buttons to get to any settings. But for TT$643.00(US$99.94) you absolutely can't go wrong. Down here a canon with 10mp would cost more than TT$2000(US$310)
customer_reviews.author: Wess S.

customer_reviews.title: The only problem
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with this camera is that it gets complimented on the pictures that I take. More than one friend (who take pictures regularly) has said, "Your camera takes good pictures." OK, it does. I wanted a reasonably priced camera that takes good pictures. After reading many reviews, I decided on this one. I would like more zoom, and maybe something "easier" to operate, but this does the job nicely. Keep those compliments coming.
customer_reviews.author: jmcread

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the challenged
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great. I have always been challenged by digital cameras, don't know why I own several computers, but this little one has changed all that. The instuctions/setup is super easy, the pictures are great and your subjects don't have what for a couple of seconds before they move to get great shots. 3 very active grandchildren have had very clear pictures taken. It has been fun to take them as well, and with not the least bit of frustration. Uploading onto the computer was very easy, the software comes with a very nice archiving system that is easy to format. Would recommend to anyone who has given up trying to take nice pictures with digital cameras.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera at a really good price & made some great pictures with it. After using it on a few vacations, I decided I wanted something with greater zoom range, & gave it to my grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Passable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because photos from my "old" Canon Power Shot A40 could not be downloaded to my Windows 7 PC and Canon does not have a driver! The new camera was less expensive and is not nearly the quality of the A40. Canon has now told me I can buy a card reader and that will fix the problem - I'll give it a try and if it works the "new" camera will just be used as a back-up
customer_reviews.author: VLR

customer_reviews.title: its okay but...
customer_reviews.text: VEry nice product, very nice picture and videos and sound and compact and big screen and several options and all. Battery lifetime was pretty decent in my tests, evebn though there was no viewfinder to save some energy. My ONLY critique is that the optical zoom does not work when shooting a movie. Only a lower quality digital zoom exists but we cannot benefit the full function of the zooming experience, even if its an only 4X zooming. For this reason, I gave it to my brother as a present, cause the price/quality is pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: Virus

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Point and Shoot.
customer_reviews.text: Good point and shoot back in its day. Although most phones nowadays have higher megapixel counts, this camera is still a solid performer.
customer_reviews.author: gshk

customer_reviews.title: fine camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera replaces an identical Canon A3000IS that disappeared sometime since February of 2012..... absolutely no idea where the previous camera, charger, case and camera cards went. If, by chance, a Canon A3000IS, Serial Number 032021003443, shows up on some Internet selling site I'd like to know about it. The camera IS REGISTERED with US Customs and Border Protection.
customer_reviews.author: XJ

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little camera
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I didn't realize it came without a memory card so I had to go to Walgreen's and get a 4GB Sandisk on sale for $10. I have taken a hundred flash pictures and battery still good. The software that comes with it for Windows is excellent. Very easy to get photos into PC with USB cable provided and very easy to send e-mails with images.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. Havener

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: Takes good pictures and the batteries last a long time (and recharge in a hurry) - I'd recommend this to anyone who wants a dependable, light weight camera that is easy to use and takes good photos.
customer_reviews.author: Earthstone

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera!
customer_reviews.text: My last camera was an HP from 2002. What a difference! I was anxious about the set up because I have vision problems but it is so clear and easy. EVERY SHOT I have taken has brought me joy! Thank you everyone for your reviews. They helped me to take up this hobby again and I can't explain how wonderful it is to work with photos again!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but disappointing quality and speed
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice camera, but it is VERY slow. Also has trouble focusing in complicated environments and makes strange choices on preset scene options. Compared to my last Cannon SD1300IS this thing is like a toy. Nice camera, but not up to what I normally expect from Cannon.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainBasic

customer_reviews.title: Broke down immediately
customer_reviews.text: Just go to Best Buy or a real camera shop if you are in the market for a good camera. This refurbished camera began to fall a part almost from the day it arrived in the mail. Avoid this vendor at all costs!
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot A3000 Does What I Need It to Do
customer_reviews.text: My camera, though inexpensive, serves me well. I'm a senior citizen, and I need an easy camera to use. This one couldn't be easier, and it takes very good pictures. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Parise

customer_reviews.title: Only received the box!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this for me on behalf of my kids for Christmas. To their surprise and mine, I opened it up to find a box containing not one, but two sets of cables, and no camera. I have contacted the seller and will update this review once they have made it right. Update: two days after my initial email to Amazon, I have my camera and our first purchase was refunded. Amazing customer service from Amazon, I am blown away, oh and the camera is pretty nice too!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Camera's performance under difficult wilderness vacationing.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is very user friendly;anyone can master its use by playing with it. It's very durable and has a long battery life. The picture quality can be adjusted to achieve an even greater quality of picture. The auto focus feature enhances your ability to shoot your desired target. The Optical Zoom allows you to take close up pictures and to see long distance targets much closer and with great detail. Finally, the camera is nice looking, sleek, and beautifully colored. They should send me a new one for free since I provided such a great review and recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Aguiar

customer_reviews.title: Good enough backup/ starter camera for kids
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they make great gifts for someone on their first camera. I thought the battery door was a bit flimsy and night shots were not great -- but for what it is, good enough. daytime shots were great. don't expect this thing to do any wonders and you'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: treezilla

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for about 2 months now. It is very easy to use and holds up to a lot of abuse (I've dropped it a few times and even dropped it in the toilet once at a party!). The picture quality is decent. It's a good camera for on-the-go as its size allows for easy travel.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good camera. Lasted me a long time. still have it.
customer_reviews.author: John T Cappelli Jr

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was a great price for the item. The only problem we had with purchasing this package was that an SD card was not included. These days that seems strange. However, the camera is great, pic quality is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Broke 5 days in
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera expressly for my post-graduate backpacking trip. On day 5, it said "LENS ERROR" and refused to close when I turned it on. Not only did I have to purchase a more expensive one (and now have to use a converter every time I charge it) but I also had the blessing of carrying around the camera as a dead weight (boo!) Thanking my lucky stars for Amazon's fantastic customer service policy, though!
customer_reviews.author: Pina

customer_reviews.title: Great little Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera! Clear pics too. Used it @ a recent Rolling Stones concert and was able to zoom in on the band and get some great shots. Battery life is nvery long too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Valderas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but...
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera because I wanted to save money but pretty soon I've found that it's photo quality when it comes to poor light conditions or moving objects the photos are not focused and very grainy. Another minor problem with the video is that the zoom is digital and when you use it the picture's quality goes down. Overall, this is not the best camera for you if you want a camera which has better quality than the average mobile phone camera.
customer_reviews.author: Axi

customer_reviews.title: SWEET AND DEPENDABLE
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera in every way. Good looks, very efficient operation, and exceptional value from Amazon. Took more than 1300 pictures in a two-week period of family and vacation activities and was very pleased with the camera's performance and the picture quality. Purchased one also for my wife and she experienced similar results in all aspects.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. SCHMITT

customer_reviews.title: I love taking photos
customer_reviews.text: This Was the best thing I got on my own I am a photographer
customer_reviews.author: Katie  L  Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera for its price
customer_reviews.text: For its price, this is a very good camera. I don't know much about photography but this camera fits the now-and-then needs of a non-photographer extremely well (gives decent quality pics and is easy to handle). Light weight, good battery life, slot for memory card are some other advantages.
customer_reviews.author: XYZ

customer_reviews.title: got 10,000 pics out of it.
customer_reviews.text: It was a decent camera. I wore it out. lol. I got 10,000 pics out of it, so I really can't complain I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Leenie

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly good photos and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new camera but my old one still worked so I bought this for $39.00. $79.00 sale price less $40.00 if you open a charge account. How could I go wrong? Took hundreds of photos on Alaska trip and they came out great!!! I keep learning new things about the camera but when you set it for "easy" it is really easy and you don't have to know much more. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. It is nice and small and it takes great pics. It is really easy to use and I love it. Also, the rechargeable battery that it comes with charges fairly quickly and it lasts for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Romero

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Image quality isn't bad for the price I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Borra

customer_reviews.title: excellent!
customer_reviews.text: bought for my son... and he's a film student.. he likes it's features and performance! very decent price and solid quality
customer_reviews.author: Twang

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Served me well over the last few years, not too fancy, but it's easy to use and takes good quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Not so great... returning.
customer_reviews.text: I have always had Canon point and shoot cameras with great success. This one had an amazing price but the quality is just not what I expected. The camera is very light and cheap feeling and the pictures are just ok. The photos that turn out have pretty decent quality, they are crisp and the light looks great however about 35% of the photos I took were blurry. The auto focus takes way too long to catch the shot.
customer_reviews.author: JodiSug

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot A3000IS
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camara for close-up photos that I use for selling on Ebay. I also use the 1300IS and it's the same way---sharp clear close-ups. I also use it for outside and distance photos and it is a fine snapshot camara. I have had several digital camaras over the years: I've been on Ebay since 1998---and these two camaras are the best close-up camaras I've owned, out of perhaps eight camaras.
customer_reviews.author: MCB 74

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Camera for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera for the price. Excellent pictures and video. Easy to use. Easy to transfer to computer. I recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: BigKHuna

customer_reviews.title: Only used it a couple of time. The lense ...
customer_reviews.text: Only used it a couple of time. The lense will not focus. It continues to readjust during photos which results in blurry pictures.
customer_reviews.author: vanna pierce

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy to use and easy to transfer photos ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to use and easy to transfer photos to computer.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa H. McGaw

customer_reviews.title: Great at $79 Amazon June 2012
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal. A colleague referred it to me after he bought his from Amazon at $78. Price creeeeeep?
customer_reviews.author: RHH

customer_reviews.title: Great point-and-shoot, with fast time between flashes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend and it's been great! She loves the camera. I'm pleased with the performance for this class of device. The thing that won me over was reading on here about the fast time between flash shots versus others in the class. I'll agree that 5 seconds is way better than 10! Overall, great camera for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for its price
customer_reviews.text: I thought the picture quality was going to be better. However, it is not bad at all. If you want to use this camera for trips or other non professional photography related events this is a very good and affordable camera.
customer_reviews.author: A. P. R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It takes clear photos and the battery life is very good. I love the manual dial to switch between modes. Easy to download on a computer. Perfect $100 camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ray

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Not only was it a great price, but it's a great camera. Compact and yet full of features. It takes great pictures and video. I couldn't be happier with a digital camera. It's perfect for capturing my children's moments.
customer_reviews.author: GOblivion

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Light
customer_reviews.text: This camera is exactly what I needed to purchase for my wife as as light compact camera with the Canon name behind it. The low price of this item is amazing. She has used this camera as soon as receiving it, and is pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: this camera is great
customer_reviews.text: i bought this after dropping my old Canon camera and this one is great, has a great zoom feature and now has rechargeable battery so i no longer need those annoying AA size batteries. very compact and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M. Hackenberg

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I was supprised by quility of the pictures. would be good to have zoom more then 4x. Otherwise the product is great and i would recommentd it to anyone. It takes 110-230 v so you can use it in Europe.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a little camera.
customer_reviews.text: For a little camera it comes with alot of bells and whistles. Takes clear shots and is east to upload to computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Price was great and the quality of these little cameras gets better and better. I bought this one for my 12yr old daughter's b-day and immediately wanted to trade with her. It outperforms so many other cameras, in my opinion... for a point and shoot, that is.
customer_reviews.author: Grant A. Batson

customer_reviews.title: Mother's Day Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my mom as a Mother's Day gift. So far she loves the camera and she has no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tana

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I had expected
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some cheap digital camera to purchase and after some surveying I ended with this. I would recommend this camera to anyone with tight budget (< $100). It is slick so that you can keep it inside your jeans pocket, and just works the way it is supposed to work. Quality is good in day light and fine during night.
customer_reviews.author: Hitesh Khandelwal

customer_reviews.title: Easy Use with Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This digital camera is light and small, very suitable for daily carry and use. I feel its picture quality is good enough for a non-professional. In particular, I love its battery, which can keep very long time after charging.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: a good quick point aand shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: for the average person this camera and its successors are perfect for the average photographer who wanrs a camera that can be pocketed. It'[s good value for the dollar.
customer_reviews.author: baron

customer_reviews.title: this camera is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a replacement of my other one that broke. Its tough sturdy and everything my previous camera was. Now I have to try and keep it away from my band mates.
customer_reviews.author: Passbyguy

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Slightly costly than Nikkon but good picture quality.You can get this if you have a better budget as always goes with Cannon.
customer_reviews.author: Sudipto Desmukh

customer_reviews.title: The perfect beginners camera
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a camera that takes nice pictures and videos also, yet compac. This is the perfect camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera, quick service.
customer_reviews.text: Camera was better than I expected. Shipping was quick. There was more included in the box than I anticipated. I didn't have to buy any new cables or anything.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Very easy to use. However, I did wish it would come with a memory card. Takes beautiful pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Grannysaver

customer_reviews.title: Gio
customer_reviews.text: It is great camera for this price. It takes good quality pictures. Very practical and amazing camera. I bought it in 2011 I still have.
customer_reviews.author: gio

customer_reviews.title: meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: for regular snap shots, not complicated to operate,nice design.i am tored to write more,next time i will skip the review
customer_reviews.author: buddy

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: this item is a great item it was on sale its surely worth the money, every las penny of money spent its worth, the picture quality is awesome, takes great clear pictures and videos as well
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my dad. He's been using it for 3 months and has no complaints. Probably takes 150 photos a month and uses all of the auto settings.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: totally disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointed. Lens error 03 was noted after 2 time of usage. Camera low light photo were pretty bad. Daylight photo were just ok, slightly washed out.
customer_reviews.author: Dioz

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera for the money... very small and compact to take along anywhere. Nice photo quality and ease of use
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Not complicated if you have used a digital camera before. I was looking for simple.
customer_reviews.author: sss

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to get battery back in.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the camera, but it is impossible to get the battery back in. Canon put an plastic piece of crap to hold the battery in an fit is almost impossible (currently impossible, I can't get it in) to get the battery back in. Don't buy this until they have a decent battery clip. Too late to return, so I am trashing this camera. I loved Canon cameras, but no more if they build junk like this.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable camera!
customer_reviews.text: After years of striking out with cameras, I have finally found one I love! Extremely easy to use, as well as lightweight and affordable, this camera is sure to please
customer_reviews.author: Amy C Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: very happy to get my 1st digital camera that works great, still learning how to do things but it will come with time.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lopes

customer_reviews.title: Good reliable device
customer_reviews.text: Good reliable device. I never had problems with it during 1+ years. A good value for the money it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Vitaly V.G. Chaban

customer_reviews.title: canon powershot, a sure good buy
customer_reviews.text: it's a decent camera, easy to use and it takes surprisingly good pictures. i'd recommend this for any person that wants a simple camera.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Soderberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Price was very reasonable and size works great to carry in my purse. Glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wheelis

customer_reviews.title: good camera at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good camera for a long time especially one from a noted manufaturer like Cannon. Thanks Cannon.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle G. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my recent trip to Italy. I wanted something small and light weight. It worked well. I should have taken more time prior to the trip to get to know more about it. I took over 464 pictures. I was surprised that the battery needed to be charged more often than I had expected. Luckily I took the charger and the converter with me
customer_reviews.author: Noirlene

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera!
customer_reviews.text: The Camera is good! Picture quality not good on screen but excellent on Computer. Nice and easy to use plus Cheap!!
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Fast boot time and shutter responce was great. Gave it to Mother in law for a big trip and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: George Botkin

customer_reviews.title: and this one made an excellent replacement.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter broke her camera of same model, and this one made an excellent replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot works
customer_reviews.text: This was my first digital camera and I found it easy to use and the quality of the pictures excellent. The computer program was also easy to implement for transfer of pictures and video. A good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Mark Coates

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light camera with good zoom and veryt nice picture quality. The only issue I have with it is that I boutght it of my in-laws and not only they, but even I are confused in the symbols on the botton because they are small and the meaning is not always clear
customer_reviews.author: Alyunya422

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA AT A GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: AT $71 THIS IS A GREAT CAMERA WITH CASE AND A 4 GIG SDHC CARD. PICTURES JUST AS GOOD AS MY $700 NIKON D50
customer_reviews.author: LASTCALL

customer_reviews.title: Promotion??
customer_reviews.text: When ordering, you claimed "instant" $30 would apply and no s&h fee..I paid s&h and there was no $30 (I applied properly)
customer_reviews.author: mickey

customer_reviews.title: First Digi Camera
customer_reviews.text: First time user learning how to operate camera needing to learn more about red eye! Otherwise so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: bobhc2

product_meta.title: Canon Powershot A3000 IS 10MP 4X Digital Camera Silver - 4254B001
product_meta.description:
Canon PowerShot A3000 IS Point & Shoot Digital Camera - 10 Megapixel - 2.70" Active Matrix TFT Color LCD - Silver 4254B001 Digital Cameras.This item comes with a battery and a charger

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 There's nothing more satisfying than taking great pictures! And with the sleek and silver Canon PowerShot A3000 IS, it's so effortless. The 10.0-megapixel resolution and 4x optical zoom with Optical Image Stabilizer ensure radiant, detailed images. Plus, you've got an advanced DIGIC III Image Processor with evolved Face Detection Technology and the Face Detection Self-Timer for extraordinary control and performance. Smart AUTO lets you handle challenging conditions with ease. 



10.0-megapixel resolution Canon PowerShot A3000 IS Highlights 

Powerful A-Series camera with 10.0 megapixels, 4x optical zoom and Optical Image Stabilizer
With the PowerShot A3000 IS, dramatic, personal pictures have never been easier to shoot and share. This 10.0 Megapixel digital camera lets you create impressive large photos of family and friends you'll be proud to display. The high-resolution images taken by the PowerShot A3000 IS can be enlarged up to 13 x 19 inches. 

The PowerShot A3000 IS has a 4x optical zoom lens that makes it easy to get the inspiring, emotive close-ups that will make your images lasting keepsakes. This magnificent lens gives you the power to shoot subjects with razor-sharp precision and stunning lifelike color. So you can brilliantly capture a shot of a sweeping landscape, or a child's big smile. 

The PowerShot A3000 IS is also equipped with Canon's acclaimed Optical Image Stabilizer Technology that automatically detects and corrects camera shake--one of the leading causes of fuzzy or blurred shots. Even when zoomed in, you can get the steady, crisp, brilliant images you'll be proud to shoot and share. And Canon's Optical Image Stabilizer Technology is so convenient to use. It functions perfectly with or without a flash. 

Lithium-ion battery
The Canon PowerShot A3000 IS uses a newly developed rechargeable lithium-ion battery. This compact, powerful battery helps make it an incredibly lightweight and slim camera. Charge-up is quick and easy, so the PowerShot A3000 IS will be ready and waiting for those special moments. 

New Scene Modes deliver more creative freedom
The Canon PowerShot A3000 IS gives you even more creative freedom by including new modes made to get the kind of images people talk about. Super Vivid captures the colors you see with your mind's eye, saturating the scene with intense colors. Turn drab scenes into exciting compositions, when dull pinks blaze into brilliant fuchsia and off-yellows suddenly burn bright and hot. Even dark colors become richer with Super Vivid. Sunsets and floral scenes turn into bursts of color, and get your photo noticed. 

Poster Effect combines several similar shades into one color, turning subtle gradations of color into eye-catching, scene-popping contrasts across your image for a unique artistic look. 

18 Shooting Modes 
Advanced presets for the best possible photos under certain conditions. With 18 Shooting Modes including Scene Modes, you're ready for whatever shot comes your way. 

Smart AUTO will do the work for you by intelligently selecting the proper settings
Low Light mode in action Just set the Canon PowerShot A3000 IS to Smart AUTO and you're ready for maximum enjoyment from your picture taking every time. It's a relaxing and satisfying way to shoot because you can completely concentrate on your subject knowing that the camera has the technical details covered. Advanced Canon technology intelligently analyzes your situation and shooting conditions. Then it automatically selects an appropriate setting from 18 specially defined settings. So whether you're photographing flowers, a captivating sunset, or your friends at the park, you can be confident that you're getting dramatic, memorable images. 

Low Light mode for improved shooting in dim lighting
With an ISO of 500-3200, the Low Light mode takes the Canon PowerShot A3000 IS where no A-Series has gone before--into the shadows! Now even scenes notorious for having insufficient light, such as those lit by candles, fire, or street lamp, come through in fantastic color and clarity, with less noise. You can keep the feel of the scene intact without adding additional light, so the result will be scenes with the visual accuracy, depth and clarity you expect from a Canon camera. 

Large, bright 2.7-inch LCD
The PowerShot A3000 IS's large 2.7-inch LCD screen gives you the big picture, whether you're shooting, reviewing or showing off your images. This high-resolution screen offers a crisp, clear and bright picture. It also features Night Display for easy viewing in low light.
feature_bullets: 4x Optical/4x Digital/24x Combined Zoom with Optical Image Stabilizer System
Motion Detection Technology, Face Detection Technology
